on reading compounds: 度【ド】degree (angle, temperature, scale, etc.), counter for occurrences, strength (of glasses), glasses prescription, alcohol content (percentage), alcohol by volume, extent, degree, limit, presence of mind, composure
重度【ジュウド】severe (injury, handicap, etc.), serious
濃度【ノウド】concentration, thickness, density, cardinality
法度【ハット】law, ban, prohibition, ordinance
ご法度【ゴハット】contraband, taboo, strictly forbidden
臆度【オクタク】guessing, speculation, supposition, hypothesis
老い支度【オイジタク】preparation for retirement, preparation for old age
kun reading compounds: 度【たび】time (three times, each time, etc.), times
度数【どすう】frequency, number of times, incidence, degree (e.g. temperature), strength (e.g. alcohol, lens, etc.)
